name: ai-case-management-system
description: AI-powered case management system with automated processing and intelligent recommendations

scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.typecheck:backend: cd backend && npm run typecheck && npm run typecheck:tests
scripts.typecheck:frontend: cd frontend && npm run typecheck && npm run typecheck:tests
scripts.verify: npm run verify:backend && npm run verify:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.mcp:playwright: npm --workspace mcp/playwright-mcp run build && node mcp/playwright-mcp/dist/index.js

author: AI Case Management Team
